topic: More people are choosing to live in large cities rather than rural areas. Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
essayText:
People go city not stay village. I think city better.

City have job. No job in village. People need money so go city work. My friend go city get job in factory.

City have good thing. School better. Hospital better. Can buy many thing in shop. Village not have this.

But city also bad. House very expensive. Too many people everywhere. Air dirty. Noisy all time. 

Village quiet and peaceful. People know each other. But boring nothing to do.

I think city advantage more because can make money and have better life. Village no future for young people.

So city better than village even have problem.
weaknesses: Major grammatical errors in every sentence
